imagingbook.pub.hough.lines

Class HoughLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.hough.lines.AlgebraicLine
      • imagingbook.pub.hough.lines.HessianLine
        • imagingbook.pub.hough.lines.HoughLine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<HoughLine>

    public class HoughLine
extends HessianLine
implements Comparable<HoughLine>
    This class represents a straight line in Hessian normal form, i.e., x * cos(angle) + y * sin(angle) = radius. It is implemented as a non-static inner class of HoughTransformLines since instances reference the enclosing Hough transform object.

    • Field Summary

      • getDistance

        public double getDistance(double x,
                          double y)
        Returns the perpendicular distance between this line and the point (x, y). The result may be positive or negative, depending on which side of the line (x, y) is located.
        Overrides:
        getDistance in class HessianLine
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of point position.
        y - y-coordinate of point position.
        Returns:
        The perpendicular distance between this line and the point (x, y).

      • draw

        public void draw(ij.process.ImageProcessor ip,
                 double thickness)
        This is a brute-force drawing method which simply marks all image pixels that are sufficiently close to the HoughLine hl. The drawing color for ip must be previously set.
        Overrides:
        draw in class AlgebraicLine
        Parameters:
        ip - the ImageProcessor instance to draw to.
        thickness - the thickness of the lines to be drawn.

      • makeLine

        public ij.gui.PolygonRoi makeLine()
        Creates a vector line to be used an element in an ImageJ graphic overlay (see Overlay). The length of the displayed line is equivalent to the distance of the reference point (typically the image center) to the coordinate origin.
        Returns:
        the new line

      • makeLine

        public ij.gui.PolygonRoi makeLine(double length)
        Creates a vector line to be used an element in an ImageJ graphic overlay (see Overlay). The length of the displayed line is measured from its center point (the point closest to the reference point) in both directions.
        Parameters:
        length - the length of the line
        Returns:
        the new line
